title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 181.12 - Reporting procedures for absentees and warrants
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 181.12 - Reporting procedures for absentees and warrants

State Regulations
(a) All cases of absence (any absence for any
reason) must be reported to the JCS (Juvenile Contact System) on the
appropriate form. (b) Unauthorized
absences (AWOL's) must be reported to the JCS on the appropriate
form. (c) Warrant information must
be reported to the JCS on the appropriate form. (d) Records should be kept in the issuing
office of all warrants issued and the status of those warrants (e.g., outstanding, executed). These records shall be available for review at any
time. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
181.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
